Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Wow wow wow. I have walked past this place a million times and by happy accident tonight a friend and I dined here. We actually had a booking at a well known restaurant across the road which was in a state of complete bedlam with tables not …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: With food enchanting both your eyes as your palate, Mr.Sam Asian Bistro could have been a perfect place to take out your loved one for a dinner. Too bad the services are not rising to the food level or the high prices! We had a reservation …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: The concept of this restaurant is that  a meal is an occasion for friends/family/couples etc. to share time and food so that everyone at the table (if they want) can have a bite of each course. They serve some of the most typical dishes of …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Delicious food, delicious wine. The staff was super friendly and the service was amazing. They really give a personal touch to the manor of service which we really loved.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Amazing experience! Great tasty food with some unique twists, and friendly service willing to chat if desired. One of my favourite restaurants in Amsterdam!

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text:
The service was fantastic, everyone is very nice and friendly.
The food was of a very high standard (try the salmon cevice) and prices fair.
Would definitely recommend.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Great food and exceptional service, one of the best dining experiences I’ve had.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Very good food, probably some of the best Asian fusion I ever had. However I was a bit disappointed with the service and the vibe of the restaurant. Don’t get me wrong, everyone that I interacted with was nice, but considering the large …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Very innovative fusion menu - definitely recommend sharing the small dishes across a group. Good price for the high quality.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: The food was delicious, creative and beautiful to look at however be warned that it is on the pricey side. Look at it as an experience eating here. Servers are very attentive, sometimes a bit too attentive which feels as if they are pushing …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Good beers. good vibe. friendly staff. very nice food. good price. we want to come back next time.  nearby Olympic stadium parking.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Great ambience! Perfect for sharing exquisite little dishes (generous portions)

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Had a great time with my love ones, together with one of best taste of the Far East.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: It is a restaurant with a comfortable intimate atmosphere, the food is excellent so is the staff

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: We ordered mr Sam Experience at Home and indeed: what an experience! Top quality food, most certainly the best take away initiative of Amsterdam. We cannot wait to return to this fine dining place!

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Great place. Friendly staff , inventive and high quality cuisine.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text:
We really enjoyed our meal here. Our waiter was very helpful in guiding our dish and wine selections.
The gyoza dumplings were a big hit as was the sushi. …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Good food and service. Menu marked clearly with allergens in each dish. Very cute space inside. A bit pricy but the quality of the food matches the price. Overall a nice experience.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Mr. Sam is just around the corner for me. On the outside it looks like a dark and small place, but once you enter the restaurant you really get absorbed into the atmosphere. It's a cosy wine and dine place, the sushi is amazing so make sure …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Food was good, but the system didn't flow well, 3 dishes came out,  then we waiting almost an hour before the next 3. All dishes were shared, but some were preferred only by some people,  so one of our party waited almost 2 hours to eat!  So a little disjointed, however quite tasty.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Lost and alone, I was lucky enough to have my phone battery die as I walked up to the entrance of Mr Sam. I stopped in, an hour before they were scheduled to open and was met at the bar by Mr Sam himself. …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Dishes are a bit hit and miss but generally very tasty food, very attentive service and nice decor. My daughter loves this place. My only gripe is that drink portions vary depending on which waiter pours them. Sometimes I end up with a teeny tiny glass of wine!

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Disappointing. Tried a wide selection of meals, one or two were almost great, some were average, and some were not great. Ambiance and decor fits a high-end billing, and the staff were nice, so I guess it's still a usual restaurant for some …

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: I tried 8 different dishes, all of them were spectacular, but even better, the service was amazing. I think this is my favourite restaurant in Amsterdam so far.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Awesome sharing dishes, so tasty and fresh. Everything we ordered was delicious. Attentive staff and hip decor. Highly recommend the house rose for a light accompanying drink.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Excellent food in a very nice bistro. Recommended you try the Carpaccio! Was on the expensive side, expect at least 45€ per person for enough dishes and some wine. Service kind of slow but with the location being so cozy it doesn't matter.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Great service and unique servings of asian food. I explained that I had some allergies for certain ingredients, then the sous chef Phil personally dropped by to explain all the different ingredients that were used in the dishes. Thanks for taking the time to check-in with us!

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Nice service and good food. Loved it

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Good food but the portion is really small. If they could increase the portion, then I would say it could be worth visiting. Slightly overprice in my opinion.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Verry good food, you can taste Asia. Try the Korean BBQ ribs at least. Our visit was made complete with friendly and competent staff.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: I had the dimsum, beef skewers and the pork belly. Also had some sweet potato fries on the side (they are called sweet potato chips). With more sides two dishes could have been enough. Everything tasted great, at a total of 40 Euro's per person (without drinks) it's not cheap though.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Fabulous dinner with friends at this gem of a place. Super friendly staff, top-notch dishes, pleasing decor. Definitely worth a repeat visit!

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Very nice ambient. Ok food. Nice service. Not sure it's my favorite but it's really nice to have a drink there if you live very close. Food seems to be liked by others , not for me. So let me not bias you

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Really really good food. We dined with the four of us. The waitress advised us a mix of foodies. All freshly prepared. Good service.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Lovely menu. Went there for my birthday, great food presentation. Lovely staff, very helpful.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Very good restaurant, the dishes are delicious.  The servers are listening and available.  the ambiance is good.  I recommend

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Friendly staff, classy interior, small but very fresh food . Almost €75 with two, not to large eaters and two drinks pp is a tad pricey. Almost four because food is very good.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: All dishes were excellent albeit the Thai Curry Seabass and Coconut Creme Brulee were standouts.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: The flavour of the food is good but slightly over-priced. It's Tapas style and they suggest 2-3 dishes pp, but they are €13/dish!

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text:
The foods were served very fresh and del, friendly staffs, especially Essia and they treated you reaaaally well (with amazing surprises acts) when it's your birthday!
Highly recommended :-)

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Exceptional food and sauces to die for! The servers are very knowledgeable and attentive but a lovely relaxed atmosphere. A must visit!

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: For the quality, location and portion sizes, I would say its overpriced. Service is okay, not supererb (we went on a busy Friday though) wine knowledge is a plus.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Service not living up to the price level

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Good Food , nicely prepared and good service but quite expensive Three bottles of water 20 euros....  4 people no starters, no alcohol and 3 deserts: 160 euros....

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: New looks but still the same cooks. Chewy meat and paprika which smells like plastic. But maybe a good place for a drink.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: We loved the restaurant. Very good dishes, excellent service and reasonable prices.

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Just great food!

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
Review Text: Food is tasty, plenty of veggy options, but everything is too sweet for my taste

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro

Name: Mr. Sam Asian Bistro
